OOC: Sorry Dewboy. I know you want this plot to work, but It just 
can't. It's just like saying Mustex knows about Veratis when they have 
not actually met in the RPG. The basic story of a rebelling faction 
sending a member to Earth was good, but you can not say 
Techno-organics were on cybertron because it is not the Cybertron that 
has been going on. Beast Machines never happened. This means that the 
Maximals safely arrived on Cybertron, took Megatron to a trial or 
something, and, in some way, he went back to Earth. That's it. BM 
never happened because if it did, Megatron never could have had went 
back to Earth, he would have been a part of Cybertron. It's hard, but 
you'll have to deal with it.
